title: The Notebook / The Wedding
description:
Listening length: approximately 13 hours
The Notebook:
 Read by Barry Bostwick Scenes from the past and a collection of intensely personal letters tell the story of a long married couple now confined to a nursing home.
The wedding: 
 Read by Tom WopatTo save his own marriage, a middle-aged man takes inspiration from his in-law's enduring love.
author: Nicholas Sparks
